Package report

Class ViewPdfController

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.ViewPdfController
  • public class ViewPdfController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for viewing a pdf used by ViewPdfScreen.fxml used by CEO to view pdf report sent by Branch manager We do this by pulling a blob from database to display the report back to CEO
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dorin bahar

      (package private) void openPdf​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      private void validate_input()

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        initalizes our combo boxes and adds event listeners to validate input by calling validate_input function

      • defineListener

        private javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<?> defineListener​(int flag)
        this func returns a change listener according to the flag we send
        Parameters:
        flag -
        • if flag=1 we create a listener for combo box that uses string
        • if flag!= creates a listener for combo box that uses branches
        Returns:
        ChangeListener

      • validate_input

        private void validate_input()
        validates that all comboboxes have been choosen if everything has been chosen we enable the open pdf button

      • openPdf

        void openPdf​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        on pressing open pdf file we quary the database for the pdf and get it's path which we save in OrderClient.loaded_file and we display that file to the user
        Parameters:
        event - Action event containing event details
